Application of Clustering to Estimate Missing Data and Improve Data Integrity (RCTL, JRS, CTM), pp. 539–544.

Integrated automation program (I.A.P.) for an electronic switching system (FA, AA, PJ, AS), pp. 144–151.

The evolution of an integrated data base (JCF), pp. 394–398.

Current trends in the development of integrated general purpose CAD systems (RJ, PR, FRV, JF), pp. 180–188.

An integrated CAD data base system (AJK, AHT), pp. 399–406.
